abstract: santa cruz warriors go 1-1 in 2018 showcase after loss to raptors 905 .
article: the santa cruz warriors were routed 83-109 on the tail end of a back-to-back by the raptors 905 on thursday . the santa cruz warriors -- g league affiliate of the reigning nba champion golden state warriors -- were completely outplayed on the tail end of a back-to-back series , losing 83-109 to the raptors 905 on thursday as part of the 2018 g league showcase . the sea dubs fall to a regular season win/loss record of 16-11 , putting an end to their 4-game win streak . the team will head back to kaiser permanente arena next wednesday to host the reno bighorns in surf city .

james southerland appeared as a starter against the raptors on thursday , leading all scorers with 24 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and one steal in 34 minutes . he shot 9-of-16 from the field and 6-of-8 from behind the arc . this was only the fifth time this season that southerland has started a game for the santa cruz warriors . this move was rather expected , as georges niang soon plans to sign a two-way contract with the utah jazz . niang was marked a dnp-cd . winston shepard contributed 15 points , four rebounds , one steal and one block in 28 minutes off the bench .

he shot 6-of-13 from the field , 1-of-2 from behind the arc and 2-of-2 from the free throw line . he 's likely to benefit from more minutes following niang 's departure . alex hamilton tallied 14 points , four rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block in 37 minutes , shooting 5-of-13 from the field and 4-of-4 from the charity stripe . damian jones , still on assignment from the golden state warriors , had 10 points , eight rebounds , one assist and three blocks in 26 minutes . he shot 4-of-8 from the field and 2-of-4 from the free throw line .
